description: Update ``aws cloudsearch`` command to the latest model

Update ``aws cognito-sync`` command to allow customers to receive near-realtime updates as their data changes as well as exporting historical data. Customers configure an Amazon Kinesis stream to receive the data which can then be processed and exported to other data stores such as Amazon Redshift.
Fix issue with platform detection on linux systems with python3.3 and higher (`issue 1199 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1199>`__)
Support paging through ``more`` when running help commands on windows (`issue 1195 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1195>`__)
Fix issue where read timeouts were not retried. (`issue 1191 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1191>`__)
Add support for regionalized policy templates for the ``create-subscription`` and ``update-subscription`` commands. (`issue 1167 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1167>`__)
Fix issue where if there is a square bracket inside one of the values of a list, the end character would get removed. (`issue 1183 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1183>`__)
